title: Exercise (run/gym/swim)
action: I will do an excercise, where the goal is not to become the best, but just to show up and improve

title: Push ups
action: I will do min 5 push ups (if I do more thats great, but doing 5 is better than nothing)

title: Sit ups
action: I will do min 10 sit ups (if I do more thats great, but doing 10 is better than nothing)

title: Squads
action: I will do min 10 squads (if I do more thats great, but doing 10 is better than nothing)

title: Pull ups
action: I will do a pull up (use your legs to support you)

title: Recreational sport
action: I will play a sport that is not meant to be exercise

title: Yoga
action: I will spend min 5 minutes to do a yoga session

title: No digital entertainment
action: I will not use an app for entertainment (i.e., when you are bored) for 1 whole day

title: Meditate
action: I will sit down (preferably somewhere calm) for 5 minutes and breath conciously with your eyes closed

title: Eat mindfully
trigger: When I take my lunch plate
action: I will turn off the television/ radio/ computer and just take the time to enjoy your meal.

title: Armish hour
action: I will turn off/leave the smartphone 1hr before going to sleep

title: Make the bed
action: I will make my bed

title: Chess
action: I will play a round of chess on my phone

title: Write down 3 expectations
action: I will think about three things I want to do today (these expectations should be in your control, it just takes you to do it and you do not rely on someone else to do it)

title: Take a picture
action: I will take a picture to conserve memories

title: Talk with a friend/ or family member
action: I will spend 5 minutes to talk to a friend or family member

title: Write down 3 things you are grateful for
action: I will write down 3 things that I am grateful for

title: Take some "me" time
action: I will spend 10 minutes to have some time by myself

title: Read
action: I will spend 1 minute reading a book

title: Learn language
action: I will spend 1 minute to learn vocabulary for a foreign language (use apps such as duolingo, etc.)

title: Write down your thoughts
action: I will spend 1 minute a day to write down what I believe is true.

title: Deep work
action: I will spend 1 hour with deep work (no distractions and no interruptions)

title: Track financial expenses
action: I will spend 2 minutes to track my financial expenses (use WalletApp or similar)

title: Reflect and post it online
action: I will spend 30 minutes to write about something that was on my mind for the past week and post it online

title: No sweets and snack
action: I will avoid foods, drinks, and snacks that contain a lot of sugar

title: Complex Carbs
action: I will minimize (1 small serving) simple carbs (white bread, white rice, white pasta, white potatoes, etc.)

title: No soft drinks
action: I will try to drink water instead of soft drinks (cola, juices, etc.)

title: Drink tea
action: I will prepare a cup of tea (preferably something that is calming and unnerving)

title: Eat nuts
action: I will eat nuts

title: Minimise saturated fats
action: I will avoid saturated fats (such as cheese, fat meat)

title: Drink 2L of Water
action: I will try to drink at least 2L of water (prepare a bottle and aim to drink that)

title: Cold shower
action: I will spend at least 10 seconds at the end of my shower with cold water

title: Floss
trigger: When I finished brushing my teeth
action: I will floss my teeth

title: Walk
action: I will spend 10 minutes to go for a walk around the block

title: Sleep 8 hours
action: I will set my alarm so that I can sleep 8 hours

title: Sun bath
action: I will spend 5 minutes outside to sun bath
